name: Habit Tracker App
description: A habit tracker app built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. It features a user-friendly interface for tracking habits, setting goals, and visualizing progress.

name: Ads Board Moroccan Handicrafts Backend
description: Node.js and Express backend for a Moroccan handicrafts ads board. Image uploads with Multer, MySQL integration, RESTful routes for ad management and admin stats.

name: Ads Board Moroccan Handicrafts Frontend
description: A React.js-based classified ads platform for Moroccan handicrafts, allowing visitors to create, view, manage, and delete ads without authentication. Fully responsive.

name: Memory Card Game
description: An interactive memory card game with cosmic visuals, multiple game modes, and adaptive AI. Built with React, Tailwind, and Vite.

name: NFT SHOP LANDING PAGE
description: NFT marketplace built with React and Tailwind CSS. It offers a sleek interface for discovering trading digital collectibles with features, interactive NFT showcases, and responsive design.

name: EBook Store Landing Page
description: Modern e-book store featuring a responsive bestsellers carousel with seamless mobile/desktop experience. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Lucide icons.

name: Interactive Presentation on SARL
description: Interactive React-based presentation on SARL business structures in Morocco, featuring animated transitions, responsive design, and professional data visualization.

name: Fitness App Landing Page
description: Interactive fitness platform featuring responsive program carousels, animated UI elements, and personalized workout tracking. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Swiper.js.
